title: Biden will travel to Buffalo on Tuesday following mass shooting, official says - CNN
content:
1. Biden will travel to Buffalo on Tuesday following mass shooting, official says  CNN
  2. Buffalo shooting shockwaves felt in New York City  CBS New York
  3. Buffalo shooting suspect Payton Gendron 'had plans to continue his attack,' police commissioner says  Fox News
  4. Buffalo supermarket massacre: NYPD steps up patrols outside Black churches, NYC Mayor Adams to speak at vigil  WABC-TV
  5. Buffalo mass shooting hits home for Harlem  CBS New York
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden will travel to Buffalo, New York, on Tuesday to meet with the families of victims after a racially motivated mass shooting Saturday at a grocery store left 10 people dead, the White House announced Sunday.
